alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 4:00PM AKDT until November 02 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY FROM THE PARKS HIGHWAY WESTWARD... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches, highest amounts west of the Parks Highway on up into the foothills of the Alaska Range. * WHERE...Susitna Valley from the Parks Highway westward. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin quickly from south to north this evening. The heaviest snowfall amounts are expected west of the Parks Highway. A sharp gradient in snowfall totals is expected in the vicinity of the Parks Highway, with much lower totals east of a line from Willow to Talkeetna.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
